Text: Thanks for being here for us.I was going to watch it on t.v. but I hate commercials.Have a good day.

Yeah... sometimes I forget what was about. If I change the channel I forget where I was. Or something else caught my eye and I forget again to get back... or come to the end. I love to watch last few scenes then asking myself "WTF... what happened...why for sake of god they haven't phoned each other or why she was dead and he just stands there... 
Yeah, I hate commercials, but I wanted to say something else.
But I forget what it was.

The older we get,the more we need a replay
button.It sounds like your day is going better
than the last few.
Ah,now I remember...thank you.
Oh, don't worry - shit will hit the fan, no doubt about... in about twenty minutes. Password is southland. Scene missed to release XviD agiain... and you know what I'm up to.
